what: Upper and lower limits for goodness of fit. — get_lims
title: Upper and lower limits for goodness of fit. — get_lims
text: function simulates upper lower limits `lims$lower` `lims$upper` : $$P({lims$lower[] <= sum(unif(n) < 1/) <= lims$upper[]} = 1, \ldots, K - 1) = 1 - alpha$$ information see "Graphical Test Discrete Uniformity Applications Goodness Fit Evaluation Multiple Sample Comparison" (Säilynoja, Bürkner, Vehtari).

title: Upper and lower limits for goodness of fit. — get_lims

text: alpha Confidence level 0 1. n Sample size. K Granularity uniform partition unit interval.

title: Upper and lower limits for goodness of fit. — get_lims
text: List containing upper lower simultaneous confidence bands evaluated \(z_i = / K\) \(= 1, \ldots, K - 1\).
